Constructor Detail

City

public City(String name,
            String country,
            Location loc,
            List<Integer> restaurantsID)
Create a new City. Will not be saved to database.

Parameters:
name - Name of the city
country - Country(entire name, in french, like Belgique)
loc - Location of the city
restaurantsID - restaurantIDs which are in this city.

getClosestRestaurantsInCity

public List<Restaurant> getClosestRestaurantsInCity(Location location)
Return restaurants contained in this city, ordered by distance from parameter "location"

Parameters:

Returns:
List of all restaurants contained in this city, ordered by distance from parameter "location"

getClosestRestaurantsInCity

public List<Restaurant> getClosestRestaurantsInCity(Location location,
                                                    int howmuch)
Return restaurants contained in this city, ordered by distance from parameter "location", limited to "howmuch" restaurants

Parameters:
location - Location from which calculate distance
howmuch - max number of restaurant to get
Returns:
List of "howmuch" restaurants contained in this city, ordered by distance from parameter "location"
